1. Why the Military Can't Trust AI  Foreign Affairs Magazine
  2. The Army is trying to identify all the obstacles to adopting AI in 100 days  Defense One
  3. Army rethinks its approach to AI-enabled risks via Project Linchpin  DefenseScoop
  4. Army Officials Plan to Reduce Cyber Risks of Artificial Intelligence  Signal Magazine
  5. ‘AI-BOM’ bombs: Army backs off, will demand less detailed data from AI vendors  Breaking Defense
